Package com.luox6.conway

Class ConwayMap

java.lang.Object
com.luox6.conway.ConwayMap
public class ConwayMap
extends java.lang.Object
Main class stores the conway map and process ticks
Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Xinhao Luo

  • Constructor Details

    • ConwayMap

      public ConwayMap​(int rowLength, int colLength)
      Initialize map with given row length and col length
      Parameters:
      rowLength - Length of map rows
      colLength - Length of map Columns

    • ConwayMap

      public ConwayMap​(Cell[][] cells, int row, int col, int tick)
      Generate map using existing information, useful when cloning map
      Parameters:
      cells - cells of the map
      row - map row
      col - map col
      tick - round where the map has been through

  • Method Details

    • getMapRowLength

      public int getMapRowLength()
      Get map row length
      Returns:
      map row length

    • getMapColLength

      public int getMapColLength()
      Get map col length
      Returns:
      map col length

    • getTick

      public int getTick()
      Get current processed ticks
      Returns:
      ticks/turn the game has simulated

    • isValidCoordinate

      public boolean isValidCoordinate​(int row, int col)
      Identify if given row/col combination is valid for current map
      Parameters:
      row - Map row index
      col - Map col index
      Returns:
      true if with map, false otherwise

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell​(int row, int col)
      Get cell status with given coordinates. Out of bound index will be remapped into valid coordinates
      Parameters:
      row - Map row index
      col - Map col index
      Returns:
      cell status

    • neighbours

      public int neighbours​(int row, int col)
      Calculate the sum of all live cell around given coordinates
      Parameters:
      row - Map row index
      col - Map col index
      Returns:
      number of alive cell

    • tick

      public ConwayMap tick()
      Move game forward by calculating each coordinates
      Returns:
      a calculated map with tick + 1

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • clearTicks

      public void clearTicks()
      This function is about clear all cell tick but keep its status Useful when need to set as begin map

    • getAliveCellNum

      public int getAliveCellNum()
      Calculate number of cell alive on the map
      Returns:
      int number of alive cell

    • getDeadCellNum

      public int getDeadCellNum()
      Calculate number of cell that is not alive on the map
      Returns:
      cell is not alive, possibly counts cell in unknown state

    • getTotalCellNum

      public int getTotalCellNum()
      Calculate number of cell this map contains
      Returns:
      number of cell on the map
